metadata.name: mercedes 666, technolust_1
metadata.description:
technolust explores a transgressive cyborgian ideology, embodying the concept of technology as an extension of self, and of a hybrid sexual identity free from social and political binaries.

a series of 10 NFTs each containing a different video clip, technolust explores a transgressive cyborgian ideology, embodying the concept of technology as an extension of self, and of a hybrid sexual identity free from social and political binaries.
the collection explores the idea of the organic human body existing within the blockchain, and if this can be realised 

ozziline mercedes (b.2k19) is a www. based multidisciplinary artist, working with performance, digital image, installation, print and sound.

she is the developer and programmer of two prominent avatars: mercedes 666 and GIRL CAM 2020.

particularly influenced by Lacanâ€™s theory of the gaze, each of her works builds upon these avatars; exploring voyeurism, digital value and what it means to be sexy in the age of neo-liberal urbanism.
